descriptionHtml:
Name: Aardvarkinvald
 Version: 1.0 
Date: 2018-05-10
Category: Quests and Adventures
Author(s): HellRaZoRIII
Source: http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=? 

Description
===========
the Eternal Order I: Aardvarkinvald.

﻿Aardvarkinvald (Dwemer) means "the Prime Vault". Artifacts deemed too dangerous or too powerful were secured here. Potemas Purse, the Red Menace, The Necklace of Doom, to name a few, and even their own scrapped Cyborg project, were hidden away and protected by a series of 'challenges', traps, and of course, the Cyborgs themselves. Enter at your own risk!

﻿Located atop a high mountain peak, Aardvarkinvald is intentionally remote, and will put your mountain climbing skills to the test. 

﻿Once you reach level 15, a courier will deliver a letter to you from an old stoner named pufnstuf. He lives in Solitude above the Thalmor Embarassy.


WARNING
=========

Cannabis related content!
NO nudity. NO sexual content.


Required Masters
===============

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm

Only Requires Base Game,  No DLC's Required.


Known Issues or Bugs
====================

*IGNORE  the Eternal Order quest, it can NOT be completed!

the Eternal Order quest is intended to be a precursor to a second mod, the Eternal Order. As such there is no completion.
I should have stated that it is "to be continued" in the objectives of that quest, my bad.


Version History
==============
1.0, 2018/03/22 - Initial release.
